import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./fruits.css" import Login from '../Login/Login' import Signup from '../Signup/Signup'; export default function Nav() { const[trigger,setTrigger]=useState(false); const[trigger2,setTrigger2]=useState(false); const signinHandle=()=>{ setTrigger(true); } const signupHandle=()=>{ setTrigger2(true); } return ( <>
